array.string: The Braille Typing interface can be used to practice typing sentances in braille.
In Settings you can configure AccessBraille to work best for you.
Get to know AccessBraille and how to get around.
A fun flash card mode to practice learning words in a game type setting.
Use your braille typing skills to set forth on an epic text adventure!
Information about the project and the technologies the developers used to create it.
